$ec2Client = new Aws\Ec2\Ec2Client([
    'region' => 'us-west-2',
    'version' => '2016-11-15',
    'profile' => 'default'
]);

$result = $ec2Client->createVpcEndpoint(array(
    // VpcId is required
    'VpcId' => 'string',
    // ServiceName is required
    'ServiceName' => 'string'
));

var_dump($result);
